import React from "react"; import '../bootstrap.min.css' import '../css/home.css' import {useState,useContext,useEffect} from 'react' import axios from 'axios' import { ToastContainer, toast } from 'react-toastify' import "react-toastify/dist/ReactToastify.css" import img1 from '../assets/img1.jfif' import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom' import { context } from "./Context"; export const View=()=>{ const det=useContext(context) const post=det.viewdetails const comments=useState([]) const navigate=useNavigate() useEffect(()=>{ //axios.get(`http://localhost:5000/comments/getcomments/${post.}`) },[]) return(


Pics World







Title : {post.Title}

Category : {post.Category}

Posted By : {post.PostedBy}

Posted Date : {post.PostedDate}



) }
